title: Perform Dressage with Airwheel intelligent self-balancing electric scooter
text: Perform Dressage with Airwheel intelligent self-balancing electric scooter In the competition of equestrianism, there is a kind of item named as dressage that is the most elegant and require high level skills. Training horse to perform equestrianism is difficult and time consuming. People can try Airwheel which and perform dressage in their own way. USA, 7 October 2015 -- Not many people have ever riding a horse, they only watched others do or they just watch the equestrianism in the Olympic Games. Among all the programs of equestrianism, there was one that can attract most of the audience with their unique performance and interesting forms. That is dressage, the French originated name mean "training‚Äù. In the competition of equestrianism, there is a kind of item named as dressage that is the most elegant and require high level skills. Training horse to perform equestrianism is difficult and time consuming. People can try Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter which can also perform dressage in its own way. People must do not aware of that they can also perform dressage with the help of Airwheel. Why not? Airwheel X3 electric unicycle adopts the core technology of intelligent technology. The lithium battery core which is equipped on the scooter is the same brand of battery for Tesla Motors. This battery core can be charged for 1800 times, which is 3.8 times of the ordinary battery. The cruising range of the battery can be as long as 2.9 times of the ordinary battery. Besides, there are three unknown advantages: intoxication, without memory effect (you can charge it whenever you need it) and quick charge.These factors all ensure that you have sufficient power to ride for a long time and keep the riding safe and sound without any worries. The totally enclosed design leave you fearless for the distain in your self-balancing scooter . The whole weight of X3 is 10 kg, which is much lesser than that of all the other scooters. The light scooter can make the player jump higher. The oretically, the X3 electric scooter cruising range can reach 18km/h. Under the terrible road conditions, the actual range can be a little less than the theoretical value. Like the horse,Airwheel self-balancing scooter can also be the good motor to ride. # # #
